title: Sussex pond pudding with apples
description: I love the traditional Sussex pond pudding but the whole thing always collapses when served so I thought it would be a good idea to pack the pudding with apples (as well as traditional lemon). The result is even more delicious! Equipment and preparation: You will need a 1.5 litre/2¾ pint pudding basin, foil and kitchen string.
ingredients: 225g/8oz self-raising flour, plus extra for dusting
150g/5½oz butter, cut into cubes, plus extra for greasing
